name: skullstylist
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.start: concurrently "node server/server.js" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
